column2: Intelligent Platform Management Interface (IPMI) is a set of standardized specifications for hardware-based host management systems used for system management and monitoring.

column2: 1) Before the OS has booted to modify BIOS settings, 2) When the host is fully powered down, 3) Access to a host after a system failure.
